comment: Shes very enthusiastic about history and will talk really fast unknowingly. Expect a review quiz every week (without a webcam) based on the textbook. There are two midterms which you really should study for even though its open note.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: She is great, lectures are fun and she is super nice and will help. Midterms are super easy, basically just do the study guides. Reading quizzes every week based on the TEXTBOOK, so make sure to read it. Easy A and great teacher.

Expect a quiz every week and they are not based on the lectures so actually read the text book. Not very understanding to student situational matters. She will not record and post lectures. Offers 5-6 missed attendance passes. Participation is part of grade. Expect atleast 2 midterms....  face to face teacher but online due to COVID
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Lecture heavy
